en.pressContinue: Press the next button to continue.
en.Title1: Weathering breaks down rocks into smaller particles.
en.Title2: The elements move small particles around.
en.Title3: Breaking down and moving small particles shape the land.
en.Title4: Soils are formed by the weathering of rock and the decomposition of plant and animal remains.
en.Title5: Rainfall affects the types of livings beings found in a region.
en.Title6: Living organisms shape the land, like a beaver's damp or a tree avoiding soil erosion.
en.Title7: The Earth is made of different layers.
en.Title8: These interactions have shaped Earthâ€™s history and will determine its future.
en.Tutorial1: To win weather all particles. Select the two identical unlocked particles on the left and right side.
en.Tutorial2: Some objects have multiple layers. Particles are locked, if there is a particle placed above or is surrounded.
en.CongratulationsScreen: Because you are awesome the LEVEL EDITOR is unlocked. After rating the game, return to create your own levels.
